Rule.Name: Ensure ServerTokens is Set to 'Prod' or 'ProductOnly' (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: ServerTokens is not set to 'Prod' or 'ProductOnly', which may reveal sensitive server information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set ServerTokens to 'Prod' or 'ProductOnly' to minimize information disclosure.

Rule.Name: Ensure ServerSignature is Disabled (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: ServerSignature is enabled, potentially revealing sensitive server information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable ServerSignature to prevent information disclosure on error pages.

Rule.Name: Ensure Default Apache Content is Removed (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Default Apache content is present, which may reveal server details.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Remove all default Apache content from the DocumentRoot.

Rule.Name: Ensure ETag Response Header Fields Do Not Include Inodes (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: ETag response headers include inode information, potentially leaking filesystem details.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure Apache to exclude inode numbers from the ETag header by using only modification time and size.
Rule.Correction: sed -i 's/^FileETag .*/FileETag MTime Size/' /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf; systemctl restart httpd
